title: Smuggling Cheap Life-robbing Philosophy as Education
description:
In the Abolition of Man CS Lewis shows that the English teachers aren't teaching English but smuggling in cheap philosophy that robs their students of what most matters in life. Dallas Willard sees that. Jordan Peterson, Sam Harris and Bret Weinstein are struggling with trying to figure it out. 

Usages of Latin in The Abolition of Man Website: http://mercury.webster.edu/kindt3/aicourse/latininlewis.htm 

Vancouver 2 https://youtu.be/BtkwF5qA6uE

Dallas Willard Veritas Forum Worldviews https://youtu.be/X6hwsG7AUZ0

The Abolition of Man  Audible https://www.audible.com/pd/The-Abolition-of-Man-The-Great-Divorce-Audiobook/B002V1NHYC

Abolition of Man Amazon https://www.amazon.com/Abolition-Man-C-S-Lewis-ebook/dp/B002BXH5RU

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

To support this channel/podcast on Patreon https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A

You can donate to Living Stones CRC to support this work here http://www.livingstonescrc.org/donate 
Donations may be tax deductible for taxpayers of the United States
